review: Fast processor, great to add life to any TV. Prime Videos, Netflix, YouTube, A&E;, History, automatic upload of cell phone's pic folder. There is an electric cord not displayed on the pic, without it supposedly the speed slows.
author: Sergio M.

review: great product the only negative I have is that there should be a browser add-on to play to the device then it would have the edge on chrome stick
author: jesse

review: The fire stick is amazing it does everything.
author: Cory Ross

review: Very easy to install and setup - straightforward. Ease of access to Netflix, games, etc. is great.
author: Kimberly Clayton

review: Love it! And love that I can use my phone to control it.
author: Megan Avis

review: Love it.. No need for a smart tv as long as you have this!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love the fact I can travel with my fire stick and use it anywhere. Very easy to use. If you own or are familiar with the Amazon Fire box than the usb is just the same thing. Offers, Netflix, hulu, Yahoo, Facebook, Amazon, vudu, etc...
author: Kate

review: The interface is a bit confusing and ill organized, but I enjoy what it's capable of. I wish it were easier to use (the way it's set up is a bit confusing, like compiling a place where all of your apps are neatly organized), but I use this all of the time. It has a really great selection of apps, though I only ever use Netflix, Prime, YouTube, and MLB.tv.It's a bit expensive, that's my only major dislike.
author: Rachel

review: Amazon fire stick is so much better than I thought it would be. I have WII and google chromecast and neither of them compares.  The streaming movies are much easier with this than any other product.
author: Richard Viers

review: wish it also streamed HBO NOW (not HBO GO), but love it! Thinking about buying another one!
author: H. clay "ms sailor"
